alert.note: Alert for Lake; Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Lake and Orange. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orlando, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Windermere, Bay Lake, Clermont, Oakland, Horizon West, Lake Louisa, Bay Hill, Doctor Phillips, Minneola, Montverde, Lake Buena Vista, Tildenville, Killarney, Magic Kingdom, Lake Butler, Animal Kingdom and Gotha. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
